=============================================================================
Run Date: JAN 25, 2010                     Designation: KMPS 2
Package : KMPS - SAGG PROJECT                 Priority: Mandatory
Version : 2.0                                   Status: Released
                  Compliance Date: MAR 27, 2010
=============================================================================


Subject: SAGG 2.0

Category: 
  - Routine

Description:
============

 This patch updates the SAGG PROJECT package to version 2.0.  
 This Version removes support for DSM/MSM and now uses API's from the
 CM TOOLS package that are not SAGG specific.
  
 Thanks to Test Sites:
 =====================
 ANCHORAGE
 FO-ALBANY
 NORTH FLORIDA/SOUTH GEORGIA
 PORTLAND
 ROSEBURG
 WALLA WALLA
 WHITE CITY 
  
 Remedy and NOIS tickets:
 ========================
 None
  
 Documentation Changes and Retrieval:
 ====================================
 The following Statistical Analysis of Global Growth (SAGG) documentation 
 is available, updated for SAGG 2.0.  Facilities should download the 
 documentation listed as follows:
  
      User Manual(PDF format)             KMPS2_0UM.PDF
      User Manual(Word format)            KMPS2_0UM.DOC
      Technical Manual(PDF format)        KMPS2_0TM.PDF
      Technical Manual(Word format)       KMPS2_0TM.DOC
  
 The preferred retrieval method is to FTP from the ANONYMOUS.SOFTWARE 
 directory at: DOWNLOAD.VISTA.MED.VA.GOV 
 This transmits the file from the first available FTP server. Sites may
 also elect to retrieve software directly from one of the following
 servers.
  
 IRM Field Office             FTP Address
 ================             ===========
 Albany                       ftp.fo-albany.med.va.gov  
 Hines                        ftp.fo-hines.med.va.gov
 Salt Lake City               ftp.fo-slc.med.va.gov 
  
 Note:  These files must be transferred in binary or IMAGE,
         not ASCII, mode.
  
 The documents can also be downloaded from the VistA Documentation Library 
 (VDL) Web page in both Acrobat PDF and MS-Word DOC formats:
  
      http://www.va.gov/vdl/application.asp?appid=115 
  
  
 Installation Instructions:
 ==========================
 1. Users ARE allowed to be on the system during the installation. 
    However, it is recommended that the patch be installed during
    non-peak time. It will take about one minute to install the
    patch, but you may queue the installation if you wish.
  
 2. You DO NOT need to stop TaskMan or the background filers.
  
 3. Use the 'INSTALL/CHECK MESSAGE' option on the PackMan menu. This      
    option will load the KIDS package onto your system.
  
 4. The patch has now been loaded into a Transport global on your system. 
    You now need to use KIDS to install the Transport global. On the KIDS
    menu, under the 'Installation' menu, use the following options:
  
                 Verify Checksums in Transport Global
                 Print Transport Global
                 Compare Transport Global to Current System
                 Backup a Transport Global
  
    On the KIDS menu, under the 'Installation' menu, use the following
    option:
  
                 Install Package(s)  
                 Select INSTALL NAME: SAGG 2.0
                                      ========
  
  
 Want KIDS to Rebuild Menu Trees Upon Completion of Install? YES// NO
 Want KIDS to INHIBIT LOGONs during the install? YES// NO
 Want to DISABLE Scheduled Options, Menu Options, and Protocols? YES// NO
  
 Routine Summary
 ===============
  The following routines are included in this patch.  Sites should use 
 CHECK^XTSUMBLD to verify checksums.  
  The second line of each of these routines now looks like:
   ;;2.0;SAGG PROJECT;<patchlist>;Jul 02, 2007
   
                   Checksum
  Routine          Old        New      
  KMPSGE        10478669    9808326    
  KMPSLK       105412992    8775180    
  KMPSUTL       16931459    5970878    
  KMPSUTL1       4941190    2285309    

Routine Information:
====================
The second line of each of these routines now looks like:
 ;;2.0;SAGG;**[Patch List]**;Jul 02, 2007

The checksums below are new checksums, and
 can be checked with CHECK1^XTSUMBLD.

Routine Name: KMPSENV
    Before:    B61565   After:    Delete  
Routine Name: KMPSGE
    Before: B49068916   After: B45420632  
Routine Name: KMPSLK
    Before: B33156819   After: B24144588  
Routine Name: KMPSLOAD
    Before:   B564565   After:    Delete  
Routine Name: KMPSPRE
    Before: B21995050   After:    Delete  
Routine Name: KMPSPST
    Before:  B2065018   After:    Delete  
Routine Name: KMPSUTL
    Before: B96161768   After: B14249417  
Routine Name: KMPSUTL1
    Before: B19706003   After:  B5705138
